name: Education Dynamics
overview: EducationDynamics, LLC, a marketing and information services company, develops and provides online tools to higher education institutions to recruit, enroll, and retain students. Its services include prospecting, such as inquiry generation, interactive and search marketing, email marketing, media placement, and educational directories; enrollment, including student acquisition, telephone and email recruiting support, yield optimization, pre-orientation programming, student relationship management, parent outreach, and list/data consultation and management; and retention comprising student development, virtual mentoring, self-assessment, portfolio and career development, and learning outcomes. EducationDynamics, LLC was formerly known as Halyard Education Partners. The company is based in Hoboken, New Jersey with additional offices in Chester and Seattle.
